attributes.action: Make electric cars cheaper to buy
attributes.additional_details: More people who choose to buy electric cars will help the environment by reducing emissions, so we can work towards a cleaner planet.
attributes.background: I would like it to be cheaper to buy electric cars so they are the preferred option when people consider buying a car.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of electric vehicles are a matter for the manufacturers and individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Abolish VAT on all Electric Vehicles: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603207
